name: Escape from Flatland (AuthenticEffortStudio)
description:
Escape from Flatland was made in little over a month for the Finally Finish Something game jam in 2022. It features small stealth encounters with small story snippets, when you find something. Maybe you can Escape from Flatland!

Please provide any feedback you have in the comments, or on twitter. I would greatly appreciate any comments and ideas for further levels or mechanics!

CONTROLS & HELP Movement is handled with WASD/arrow keys and you can reset the level at any time with the R key. 

Later in the game, you can also put down lures, that the enemies will investigate.
